ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: a place in which they will remain for ever,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Where they will abide for ever;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: wherein they shall abide for ever;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: In which they will abide forever.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Wherein they will abide for ever;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: wherein they will remain [in a state of bliss] forever.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: They will abide therein for ever.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Wherein they shall remain for ever:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: and they will live for ever therein.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: In which they will abide forever.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: In which they will remain forever
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [18:3] wherein they will abide forever, and this [reward] is Paradise;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Wherein they will abide for ever) they will abide in this reward forever: never to die or be removed from it;
